channel.title: Turning on the server
channel.description: ok i have made my server and things im all done nameing and puting port in but how do i turn my server on?

item.title: Turning on the server
item.dc:creator: @zeshan zeshan
item.description:
@zeshan wrote:

k he’s right but still it goes

  1. Open Source File
  2. Find ur Compiler
  3. Compile FIRST usually you have to do c and then enter
  4. After it compiles, and It says you don’t have JDK you have to download it really easy just go on google and write JDK 6.0 and download that.
  5. After that press enter and it comes to main compiler again, do “r” it usually works maybe you have differnt code
  6. After that when you do “r” it should come as, Server Name and then Port usually, can be possible to work someother way
  7. Leave that on, and IF YOUR HOSTING, Put NO-IP on, and The other progess to HOST IT …

Well that’s basically it, GOODLUCK … Shld help IF that don’t work i dunno maybe it’s that u didn’t do the ROUTER PROCESS

Read full topic

item.title: Turning on the server
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Reaper1 Soul_Reaper
item.description:
@Soul_Reaper1 wrote:

first open ur source file
2nd find ur compiler
3rd compile first
4th there should be an option to
run ur server do that.

And when ur on w/e client ur
going to play it on us a local host ip
like 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

If that dont work then im sorry
dont know what else to do.
